s;Simon;So, this is one of the previous houses?{w}{br}I assume you're trying to say that we'll all meet the same fate?
s;Lachesis;They said House Moran had unparalleled might,{w} but it fell nonetheless.
s;Lachesis;They said House Vesner could defy the cycle,{w} but it fell nonetheless.
s;Lachesis;The houses now are no different.
